title: Charlize Theron sports a nude look as she rocks a thumb brace while heading inside to Jimmy Kimmel
text:
She's stepping out with a new kind of accessory.

As Charlize Theron was heading inside to Jimmy Kimmel Live, she was spotted sporting a thumb brace while wearing a head-to-toe nude ensemble.

The 44-year-old actress cut a chic figure as she favored her hand while surrounded by a team of bodyguards while out promoting her new movie, The Addams Family.
